name: Poppity Pop - Kids Balloon Popping Game
name_original: Poppity Pop - Kids Balloon Popping Game
description:
Swoosh went the wind on a warm summers day, blowing all the balloons away. Find the balloons and poppity pop - it’s a game.

Pop your way through this unique kids game and see if you can unlock all the levels or even get the highest score!

-------------------------------

Poppity Pop features:

• Hand Crafted graphics that will have you popping for joy
• Boosters and power ups to help with those challenging levels
• Easy and fun to play
• Leaderboards to watch your friends and competitors!

-------------------------------
